name: Love Japanese Crossword - Cute Nonogram for Loving Couples
name_original: Love Japanese Crossword - Cute Nonogram for Loving Couples
description:
Play the best FREE Valentine Nonogram!

If you like different puzzles, crosswords, Sudoku, Kakuro, hangman games and other different games that allow your brains to work hard, than our nonogram is for you!

Nowadays Japanese Crossword is one of the most popular logic puzzles in the world. It became popular at the end of XXth century in Japan and now it has many fans all over the world.
Let us introduce you our version of this legendary game!

Our game it’s a classical black and white crossword.
It has short and simple rules. So, if you are just a beginner, this nonogram will give you a great opportunity to open Japanese crossword world for yourself and to learn something new.

The main goal of the game is to reveal the hidden image. You need to choose which cells will be painted out and which will be empty by using numbers, keys and logic. The big advantage of this game is that you do not need to remember and know a large number of unnecessary facts and definitions. You just need to count cells.

Of course sometimes you can guess what picture is hidden under the white cells. But mostly you can’t guess the image till the end. And that contains the main interest.

Don’t worry if you forget something. Section “How to play” will remind you all rules of the game.
Also this app has 30 levels of varying difficulty. 30 levels, 30 unique pictures and hours of pleasant and relax gameplay.

There are three types of boards: 10*10 cells, 15*15 cells, 20*20 cells. So, for professionals this crossword will be interesting because of new simple and difficult puzzles. It is a great chance to test your skills because new level will be unlocked only when you 100% complete the previous one.

At the same time this game is intended to entertain you but not to weigh you down.
That’s why this version of Japanese Crosswords has simple design. There is no limitation in time and no scores.

You mustn’t be quick, it’s not a competition. Soothing colors of the game will allow you to relax and enjoy the game after a hard day at work or university. Advertisement is almost absent, so it will not disturb you or distract you from the app. The game has inapp music but you can easily turn it off if you need silence or want to listen music from your playlist.

May be sometimes you will need help. In section “Settings” you will find it.

There is also a handy feature - 3D effect. It makes an impression of full presence. It looks like you solve the puzzle not on your phone, but on the paper.

The game is available only in English language.
So, let’s sum up!

Features:
- Free;
- 3D;
- Simple menu context;
- Simple design;
- Pinch Zoom on the Mobile Devices;
- Perspective view;
- 30 levels;
- Different types of boards;
- Small app size;
- No banners in game play.

If you enjoy Love Japanese Crossword please take the time to write a review.

Don’t forget that we are ready to answer your questions, so don’t afraid to contact us. We are opened for new propositions.
